explains: v. 提供餐饮服务，承办酒席；满足，迎合
wordGroup: cater for 迎合；供应伙食；为…提供所需

sentences.en: They only publish novels which cater to the mass-market.
sentences.cn: 他们只出版迎合大众市场的小说。

sentences.en: In the contemporary western world, rapidly changing styles cater to a desire for novelty and individualism.
sentences.cn: 在当代西方世界，快速变换着的款式迎合了人们对新奇和独特性的追求。

sentences.en: We cater to an exclusive clientele.
sentences.cn: 我们满足一个特殊客户群的需求。
